description:
Armed by a generous patron, the Nomads attack Section 9 with AI drones. Togusa accepts a new mission from Japan`s peace-seeking Prime Minister.
Source: netflix

titles.title: AT YOUR OWN RISK 壁が隔てるもの
At Your Own Risk: Divided by a Wall
At Your Own Risk: Kabe ga Hedateru Mono
POR VOSSA CONTA E RISCO - Separados por um muro
